author: RTÉ News
title: President says severity of Covid-19 is in our hands
description: President Michael D Higgins has said the severity and magnitude of the Covid-19 pandemic is in our hands.
content:
President Michael D Higgins has said the severity and magnitude of the Covid-19 pandemic is in our hands. 
In a message to Irish people at home and abroad at Easter, the President said that by co-operating and working with the measures suggested to combat th… [+5370 chars]
